bible.send votd: Send me the Verse of the Day
bible.related devos: Free Reading Plans and Devotionals related to {reference}
bible.cta: Telechaje Aplikasyon Bib pou timoun nan
bible.title: Telechaje Ap Bib la kounya

users.error deleting account: Dezole, te gen yon pwoblèm nan fen nou an. Tanpri eseye ankò oubyen kontakte sipò.
users.account already confirmed: Kont ou an déjà konfime! Konekte pou kontinye.

bible versions.title: Vèsyon Bib yo
bible versions.audio bible meta: Koute sou nèt la pou gratis oswa telechaje aplikasyon Bib YouVersion lan ki vote#1 pou ka tande Bib odyo yo sou telefòn ou.

marketing.plans copy: Bible Plans help you engage with God's Word every day, a little at a time.
marketing.download app copy: Tens of millions of people are using the Bible App™ to make God's Word a part of their daily lives. Download the free app and access your bookmarks, notes, and reading plans from anywhere. Enjoy hundreds of versions, including audio, all on your mobile device.
marketing.tagline: the Bible that goes with you anywhere
marketing.verse action copy: Pati Souliye oubyen fè makpaj vèsè prefere yo, fè Vèsè Imaj ke ou ka pataje, e atache Nòt piblik oubyen prive a pasaj Bib yo.
marketing.versions copy: Select any Bible verse or passage, linked directly to any of YouVersion’s 1,200+ versions, in 900+ languages. People viewing your Event can tap your reference to see it in their Bible App reader, where they can Bookmark it, Highlight it, and more.
marketing.download or read: Telechaje kounya oswa li sou entènèt.
